infos.value: That's that, then.
That was the royal guard...? Muraga's army isn't much, aye?
No, we're just too strong for the likes of them! Gwahahaha!
Now, to present these big old stone chests to Lord Sadali.
They sure look heavy though, aye?
Gwahaha! Silly us, killing all the people who could've helped us!
But hey, Lord Sadali will understand when we give him these, aye?
Muraga'll look like a worthless turd compared to us!
Let's get going then, Brother.
Right there with you, Brother.
Ngh!
Owe... Why must you have died while I survive?
The king must know what transpired here at once...
Or, no... Perhaps not.
Dorando and Gargas believe me dead.
Sadali will no doubt believe their report as well. And if so...
There may be a way to use this to our advantage. Owe's life will not have been spent in vain.
The queen of Leonis is dead, they'll say...
Yes, I shall return to who I was before my marriage to King Oelde...
...back when I was feared as the Black Rose of the Battlefield.
Their carelessness will become my strength.
Both Muraga and Sadali shall fall before me, and Leonis will rise again!
